Please note:
* Strong Prescriptions - Prescriptions with CYL of +/- 3.00 and above
Glasses with tinted lenses or Transitions lenses will require additional days to process.

All international shipments are subject to import taxes and VAT.

title: PRISM
description: Prism is prescriped to correct an imbalance between the eyes. If nothing appears in this column, you have no need for Prism.
